### A basic diagram 
```{r}
library(DiagrammeR)
mermaid("
graph TB
  A-->B
  A-->C
  C-->E
  B-->D
  C-->D
  D-->F
  E-->F
")
```

### Data Types

```{r}
mermaid("
graph TB
Data-->Primary
Data-->Secondary
")
```
